title: Louisiana
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/United States - Description and travel
description: Episode of Series "Rand McNally video visit trips". Louisiana is visited by over 24 million tourists anually and no wonder! North Louisiana provides a sportsperson's paradise with freshwater lakes, beautiful gardens and a range of outdoor activities. Louisiana is famous for its wonderful plantation homes and is the Cajun cookery centre of the world. New Orleans has the reputation of being one of the world's loveliest and liveliest cities. An historic city, New Orleans is the home of jazz and attracts a constant stream of visitors. This entertaining and informative travelogue will captivate the dedicated armchair traveller.
related_objects: Series; S01045; Rand McNally video visit trips; Active; 1987
